overview:
Malissa is responsible for leading sales efforts for Drobo’s award-winning prosumer products.

Malissa brings over 15 years of successful sales management and channel marketing experience from Snap Appliance, Adaptec, Wyle, and Pioneer Standard Electronics and was recently named one of the top 100 Women in the Channel by CRN. In addition to being a top producing sales professional at Wyle and Pioneer (both acquired by Arrow Electronics), Malissa was instrumental in channel strategy and sales growth at Snap Appliance that ultimately led to a successful acquisition by Adaptec.
